title: Ep183: The Sex Trade and Tech in the Bedroom feat SX Noire
itunes:title: Ep183: The Sex Trade and Tech in the Bedroom feat SX Noire
description:
In this week's episode of Whoreible Decisions the duo is joined by sex work activist, Thot leader and VP of women of sex tech SX Noire to discuss sex and tech. We start off with a few ice breakers before the whore'derve gives sex tips on self recording and filming yourself in the bedroom with your partner(s). Then we get into the sex trade and what it means. What is classified as sex work and what is not and also how you can be an ally. Follow this week's guest on social media @sxnoire This week's episode is brought to you by Dipsea. Get a 30 day free trial when you sign up at DIPSEASTORIES.COM/WHOREIBLE. That's dipseastories.com/WHOREIBLE Join the RedPanda Stock Club now: https://joinredpanda.samcart.com/products/wd50/ All caught up? Become a patron now and get 3 bonus episodes every month! Join now at patreon.com/whoreibledecisions

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
